The game builds upon the strengths of the original Portal - challenging puzzles, witty dialogue, a quirky sense of humor - as well as creating a deeper storyline and longer play time than the original Portal.

Portal 2 - это шикарное продолжение знаменитой логической игры Portal, созданной компанией Valve. В ней есть все, что нужно для приятной и комфортной игры. Здесь есть, хороший сюжет, шикарная атмосфера, красивая и красочная графика, удобный и легкий геймплей, приятная и качественная озвучка (особенно “GLaDOS”), интересные задачки для ума и классный кооперативный режим, где можно подумать над комнатами в 2-е головы. 

В итоге игре можно заслуженно ставить 10/10 баллов! Покупайте и наслаждайтесь!
Gutes Spiel, gute Rätsel lustige Sprüche

Abwechslungsreiche, schwierige Rätsel verpackt mit jeder Menge Humor

Not sure why I got the short end of the stick with this game, but for an entire year after I bought the game, it would never load past the valve logo and would just crash to desktop with a message saying "Portal2.exe has stopped working." Then one day about a month ago I try again and suddenly it works perfectly. I'm still reccomending it anyways though because it's a wonderful game and I love everything about it. I'm not gonna be brought down by a little delay in my ability to play it.

This is the best alternative sci-fi 3D action as it gets...
The perfect sequal
Great gameplay rate and an action packed unfolding storyline with a lot of twists and turns and of course good old portals! ;)
9/10

This game kept me hooked until the very end. I scrambled to complete the achievements, and made some good friends in doing so. Yet, even though I completed every achievement in the game, I still feel a need to revisit the game every so often.

One aspect that I love about this game is when you revisit the test chambers you were stuck on and realize: "This is really easy!" or "I can see why I was stuck..."

I personally find this game entertaining in every sense of the word, and it is worth the money. It is an experience that kept me going from start to finish and beyond.

I think Portal 2 is kind of a must-have game.
It has:
- a very nice story
- challenging puzzles
- a really cool co-op mode
- a simple to understand level creator
- unlimited gameplay (thanks to the community & workshop)

And it's not required to play Portal first, but I would recommend to play it first. ;)

Genius, unique and bloody brilliant. I would recommend to everybody. Instead of following the path of the usual games nowadays, they took their own path and created something so different than any other game I've ever played. Portal 2 is better than Portal 1. If you play the first before the second, you will be shocked by how much better the second one is. This is an AMAZING game. I love all of the easter eggs and hidden things scattered around for you to come across while trying to figure out how to solve the crazy, puzzling rooms. If you love room escape type games, you will ADORE this. 10/10.

Another flawless game by Valve. I really dont know how to review this game but Ill do my best. This game is fun, has good puzzles, and isnt complicated. I had more fun playing with my friend online though, but he thinks Portal 2 is too old now so he wont play with me :(. Anyways, this game is good, and I reccomend playing with a friend. 10/10. HOWEVER, if you dont like puzzle games, you wont like this game.

Chell, your character, it's a girl, who can't speak (as we can see) and can't show our impression, except making the puzzles, running and JUMPING.(Why not? :))

**(after playing portal1)

Mmmmh... Portal 2.... Digamos que este juego desde sus inicios ha revolucionado la industria de los videojuegos, por suerte para Valve cuando se creo Portal, no creyeron que este llegarian a hacer una segunda parte. 
Suelen decir que las segundas partes son peores, pero en videojuegos siempre suelen ser mejores, por ejemplo añadirle un modo on-line, comentarios de los desarrolladores, pruebas cooperativas y más adelante añadir a traves de una actualización los mapas personalizados puede que influyeran para que este juego se conviertiera en lo que es ahora un exito en ventas, siendo uno de los más vendidos en Steam desde su lanzamiento en 2012 (creo)... 
No seria de extrañar si te vicias a este juego, su gran historia y esos momentos inesperados de este gran juego haran que te enamores sencillamente de él. Cabe destacar que no es siempre el mismo argumentos de pruebas aburridas que habia en los inicios de Portal 2, al despertar nos encontramos en una habitación de hotel o eso parece... (No dare spoilers). 
También a los desarrolladores añadieron bugs, una pieza de música oculta, un final de juego excelente, nuevas pruebas, aparte de las viejas y 2 compañeros que te guiaran en el proceso.
¡Un gran juego, entrando en mi TOP 10 de juegos favoritos ;)!

This game has a wonderful storyline, as well as a plethora of fun gameplay :D
I enjoyed the game overall, but I don't have anyone to play multiplayer with & it is hard to find anyone to play with.

Un juego que superó a su anterior entrega, tiene niveles que pueden llegar a ser complicados pero no imposibles, con más duración que la primera parte es 100% obligatorio jugarlo si te gusto el Portal original.

INSANELY good. I actually played this game at a camp before making my Steam account, and it's one of the major reasons I even made it in the first place! I'm not a huge puzzle gamer, admittedly, but this game is just insanely good. The puzzles are all well-designed and none of them feel too easy. That "a-ha!" moment when you figure out what to do next is more satisfying than in any other game I've played. And don't even get me started on the writing. Near-flawless game, pick it up immediatly if you're one of the 2 or 3 people who still hasn't played it.
best puzzel game ever
Such a nice and futuristic like game! Never played the first game however, but the entire story line gave such a nice atmosphere. Plus, the co-op is just too fun

es el mejor juego que he jugado jamás. Lo tiene todo, y con todo me refiero a TODO. Tiene humor, tensión, puzzles, drama y una campaña que ya querrían todos los juegos tener. Merce mucho la pena, y para aquellos que se lo estén pensando por que no han jugado el primer Portal, yo les digo que se lo compren igualmente. Con saber cuarto cosas básicas del primer juego, no tienes por qué habertelo pasado. Además, este juego viene con modo cooperativo y una workshop increíble, para que cuando te pases la campaña puedas seguir comiendote la cabeza con los portales. Seguro que me quedo algún detalle, pero os aseguro que se os gustan un poco los puzzles, Portal 2 os remata la faena y os reagala una historia fascinante.

One of the most enjoyable and challenging games i have ever played. Any game that has you thinking and enjoying at the same time is a winner in my book.

gran bel gioco

Fantastico, dal primo capitolo al secondo c'è un bel passo avanti. Per cominciare la grafica, ben definita rispetto al primo e la storyline è molto piu' articolata. Inoltre la longevità del titolo è paurosa. Il Single player durerà circa 10 ore in piu' rispetto a Portal 1, e la CO-OP regala un'altra decina di ore. 

L'implementazione del Workshop è fantastica, cosi da far vivere di più il gioco. Anche il fatto di creare dei puzzle da soli e poi inserirli nel Workshop è carina come idea.
